info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:07PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Powell County through 445 PM MDT... At 406 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of Garrison, or 23 miles north of Deer Lodge, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elliston, Avon and Finn. This includes Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 15 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
